text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Trump: I don't like the Message. So Kill The Messenger. 

Trump Hates Truth. The Truth Is that Trump Underplayed the risk of the Coronavirus Pandemic. And He Is Responsible for the thousands of deaths that is occuring each day. He called it a hoax and called it a flu. What a fool
